SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Explore a world of innovation at your fingertips
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from people who've found their next favorite product
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely transformed how I discover new products. It's like having a personal shopper in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've found so many unique gadgets I never knew existed. It's addictive and has made gift-giving a breeze!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a small business owner, this app has been invaluable for sourcing new inventory. It's expanded my product range significantly.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore a world of innovative and exciting new products tailored to your interests
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us what you're looking for and we'll help you find it!
CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: What type of product are you interested in?
Any specific features you're looking for?
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: AI-powered home management and voice control
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Smart pot that purifies air and monitors plant health
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Lightweight, electric scooter for urban commuting
CTA_BODY: Explore a world of innovative and exciting products tailored to your interests. Our app makes finding new items you'll love easier than ever.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the product discovery app work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of new products tailored to your interests and shopping habits.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our app is completely free to download and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but core functionality will always remain free.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How often are new products added?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the latest and most exciting new items across various categories.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides links to trusted retailers where you can easily purchase the products you discover.
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover the Latest and Greatest Products
HERO_SUBTITLE: Uncover Exciting New Products with Ease
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about discovering exciting new products
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of the latest and most innovative products from various categories and brands.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, our app is completely free to download and use. We may offer premium features in the future, but our core product discovery service will always remain free.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't handle transactions directly, our app provides links to trusted retailers where you can purchase the products you discover. We're working on integrating direct purchasing in future updates.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product database daily to ensure you always have access to the newest items on the market. Our team constantly scours various sources to bring you fresh and exciting discoveries.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share product discoveries with friends?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app includes easy sharing options for all major social media platforms and messaging apps. You can also create and share curated product lists with your friends and followers.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Explore, Compare, and Find Amazing Innovations
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our curated selection of the latest and most popular products across various categories.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Get tailored product suggestions based on your interests, browsing history, and preferences for a truly customized shopping experience.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with authentic user reviews and ratings from real customers who have purchased and used the products.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals by comparing prices across multiple retailers, ensuring you always get the most value for your money.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Save your favorite products to your wishlist and receive instant notifications when they go on sale or become available.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Explore a carefully curated selection of unique and innovative products that you won't find in traditional stores.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing ProductPulse: Your Gateway to Innovation
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore a curated world of cutting-edge products, from tech gadgets to lifestyle innovations. Stay ahead of the curve and be the first to know about the next big thing.
